responses: What's the best thing about Switzerland? I don't know, but the flag is a big plus.
I invented a word today: Plagiarism.
When life gives you mold, make penicillin.
What do you call a bear with no ears? B.

An infinite number of mathematicians walk into a bar. The first asks for a beer. The second asks for half a beer. The third asks for a quarter beer. The fourth is begins to order an eighth of a beer but the bartender cuts him off, stating 'You're all idiots'. He pours two beers and goes to help other customers.
A pizza with depth a and radius z has a volume of pi z z a.

Time flies like an arrow... but fruit flies like a banana.

Why can't a leopard play hide and seek? He was always spotted.
